title: 2021 Women's South American Volleyball Championship
description: The 2021 Women's South American Volleyball Championship was the 34rd edition of the Women's South American Volleyball Championship held in Barrancabermeja, Colombia and organised by South America's governing volleyball body, the Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol (CSV). The champion and first runner-ups will qualify for the 2022 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship.
